translation.en: For thousands of years,
Buddha oversaw the universe.
And the Immortal Ones in heaven
translation.es: Y los inmortales en el cielo,

translation.en: and kings in hell
translation.es: y los reyes en el infierno,

translation.en: watched over earthly affairs.
Demons walked among us,
and dragons ruled the sea.
translation.es: y los dragones dominaban los mares.

translation.en: Everything was in balance.
We respected the gods, and we followed the rules
translation.es: Respetábamos a los dioses y seguíamos las reglas

translation.en: until the night a magical rock
translation.es: hasta aquella noche en que una roca mágica

translation.en: gave birth to a powerful being.
translation.es: dio a luz a un ser poderoso.

translation.en: Meet
trouble.
Okay, okay. Attention, everyone.
translation.es: Bien. Atención. Tenemos asuntos importantes que tratar.

translation.en: We have important business to discuss.
translation.es: Atención. Tenemos asuntos importantes que tratar.

translation.en: I, your Jade Emperor,
translation.es: Yo, Emperador de Jade, Arquitecto del Universo,

translation.en: Architect of the Universe and Lord of the Immortals,
translation.es: Yo, Emperador de Jade, Arquitecto del Universo, Rey de los Inmortales,

translation.en: shall throw the greatest, most fantastic banquet
translation.es: daré el más fantástico y grandioso festín

translation.en: since the one we did last Tuesday.
translation.es: desde el que dimos el martes pasado.

translation.en: Doesn't that sound fun, hmm? Understood, Your Majesty.
Now, seating arrangements. Place the Immortal Ones at my head table.
translation.es: Bien, los asientos. Los inmortales, en la mesa principal.

translation.en: Minor gods by the kitchen in the back--
What on Earth?
Hm, an uncontrollable monkey shooting light beams from his eyes?
translation.es: ¿Un mono incontrolable dispara rayos de luz de los ojos?

translation.en: He's probably just excited, Your Majesty. We can't have that. Get rid of him.
translation.es: - Debe estar emocionado, su alteza. - Desháganse de él.

translation.en: - Patience. -
Buddha! I didn't see you there.
This monkey is a powerful being.
translation.es: Este mono es un ser poderoso.

translation.en: He has an important destiny.
Let him find his way.
Very well.
I mean, what's the worst it can do, right?
translation.es: ¿Qué es lo peor que puede hacer?

translation.en: Where were we? Ah, dessert!
I'm thinking a ten- foot egg tart sculpture of me.
translation.es: Pensaba en una escultura mía de tres metros de tartaletas de huevo.

translation.en: A wise monkey never stretches beyond his grasp.
translation.es: Un mono sabio nunca se estira más de lo que puede.

translation.en: Will you let go?
As I was saying,
if the coconut is meant for us,
translation.es: si el coco es para nosotros,

translation.en: it will be within reach.
Mm. Not today.
Out of the light!
No, no, no, no!
- We live in a world of rules and order. - Oh?
translation.es: Vivimos en un mundo de reglas y orden.

translation.en: Observe.
Think of my palm as our universe.
translation.es: Piensa que mi palma es el universo.

translation.en: Compared with this greatness,
one little monkey is an insignificant pebble.
translation.es: un monito es una piedrita insignificante.

translation.en: Only the Immortal Ones in heaven are free to live without rules.
translation.es: Solo los inmortales en el cielo son libres de vivir sin reglas.

translation.en: Know your place, young one.
Come back here right this minute!
Out of the light!
Come back!
- Run! The demon is here! - Oh.
Your recklessness drew the Demon of Havoc upon us.
translation.es: Tu imprudencia atrajo al Demonio de la Devastación.

translation.en: You don't belong here, outsider!
Coconut him.
Ha ha! Okay, imaginary family, give me some love.
Oh, too slow.
Come. Gather 'round, young ones. Aw.
Feel the safety.
Feel your insignificance.
- Breathe-- - Nap time's over!
- You again? - You're in danger! Follow me and--
translation.es: - Tú otra vez. - Están en peligro. Síganme…

translation.en: I, uh, thought that would play out differently.
translation.es: Creí que resultaría de otro modo.

translation.en: Come on! It's getting away!
You fool! You think you're some kind of hero?
But I can beat that thing.
And save the baby?
Sure. If there's time.
With what? Coconuts?
Coconuts are no threat to the Demon of Havoc.
translation.es: Los cocos no derrotarán al demonio.

translation.en: - He could get a weapon. - Ha. From where?
Oh, oh, I know! From the Dragon King.
Yeah, the Dragon King.
At the bottom of the sea?
If you go out there, you will die.
Says you.
Crazy fool!
One weapon coming right up.
Coming to the stage, let's give it up for…
The reptile of style.
The overboard overlord.
With the sweetest vocal cords.
The Dragon King!
My loyal subjects…
this grand column has stood here since the dawn of time.
translation.es: La gran columna ha estado aquí desde el inicio de los tiempos.

translation.en: It has waited patiently for the mightiest, fiercest rebel
translation.es: Ha esperado con paciencia que el rebelde más poderoso,

translation.en: with the best style, of course,
to free its monumental potential.
That rebel is me!
My gorgeous machine will unleash the column's power
translation.es: Mi bella máquina desatará el poder de la columna

translation.en: to create the greatest storm the world has ever seen.
translation.es: para crear la tormenta más grande que el mundo jamás haya visto.

translation.en: Wow!
You talk?
You've been waiting for me? How long?
Well, five minutes isn't--
Five thousand years?
The days when sea creatures are looked down upon
translation.es: Los días en que las criaturas marinas son menospreciadas

translation.en: by those air- breathing dry- landers are over!
translation.es: por esos terradores que respiran aire han terminado.

translation.en: You're looking for the most powerful being?
No way! I'm actually on a quest for the ultimate weapon!
translation.es: ¡No puede ser! Yo busco el arma más poderosa.

translation.en: - What are the odds, man? -
There's gotta be some way we can help each other.
translation.es: Tiene que haber un modo de ayudarnos.

translation.en: If you were just a little smaller, maybe I could--
Let our conquest begin!
But first, a song. And five, six, seven, eight!
translation.es: Primero, una canción. Cinco, seis, siete, ocho.

translation.en: - Whoa! - Is this part of the show?
- What is happening? - Look out!
Someone's stealing the grand column! Is that a monkey?
translation.es: Alguien se roba la gran columna. ¿Es un mono?

translation.en: You are incredible!
- Excuse me, sire, but-- - Zip it. I have a call to make.
translation.es: - Disculpe, señor… - Cállate. Haré una llamada.

translation.en: I demand satisfaction.
Oh, it's you. What is it? I'm busy.
A monkey stole my grand column.
So?
So? Someone could do a lot of damage with that thing. Theoretically.
translation.es: ¿Y? En teoría, podría causar mucho daño con esa cosa.

translation.en: You're a king. You handle it. I believe in you.
translation.es: Eres un rey. Ocúpate. Creo en ti.

translation.en: Perhaps you could escalate this to the big guy? Delegate up?
translation.es: Tal vez podrías comentárselo al grandote. ¿Delegarle el problema?

translation.en: Ah, let's see. Dear Buddha.
Remember that stone monkey you said to leave alone?
Well, it took a stick. We're all scared. Please save us.
translation.es: Se robó una vara. Tenemos miedo. Sálvanos.

translation.en: No. Not happening.
Very well. I shall take things into my own claws, and woe to those that-- Oh!
translation.es: Bien. Me encargaré con mis propias garras, y pobre de aquel que…

translation.en: So it's the monkey who's the mightiest, fiercest rebel.
translation.es: Así que el mono es el rebelde más poderoso.

translation.en: With the best style.
Yeah. And he swiped the one thing you need to take over the world.
translation.es: Y se llevó lo único que necesitabas para dominar el mundo.

translation.en: - What a guy! -
Any other comments? Input? Friendly feedback?
- Not me. - Mm- mm. Nope.
No? Then draw me a bath!
The outsider's back.
- He didn't die. - He got a weapon.
He got a stick.
We can do this, right?
Hold on? What do you mean hold on?
- Stay here and keep a lookout. -
Just hang on.
- I am hurrying. -
If you're so smart, you do it.
translation.es: Si eres tan lista, hazlo tú.

translation.en: Stick, where are you?
- - Not that way!
Wait! What are you doing?
- Monkey. - You're just making it angrier.
Stop, Stick!
Come back, Stick!
Oh yeah! Awesome. I get it now.
Wave bye- bye to the nice kitty.
translation.es: Saluden al gatito que se va.

translation.en: What?
Bad kitty god! Ow, ow, ow, ow, ow!
Monkey King! Monkey King!
Monkey King! Yes. I like it. Has a nice ring to it.
translation.es: Rey Mono. Sí. Me gusta. Suena lindo.

translation.en: The ultimate weapon for the ultimate hero!
translation.es: ¡La mejor arma para el mejor héroe!

translation.en: Absurd!
You're a tiny pebble, remember?
He doesn't love you.
He just wants you to love him!
You'll never be one of us.
You're a selfish, rebellious fool,
translation.es: Eres un tonto rebelde y egoísta

translation.en: who will end up all alone.
I'm not alone. I have my Stick.
translation.es: No estoy solo. Tengo mi vara.

translation.en: That weapon should be wielded by one of the Immortal Ones.
translation.es: Esa arma debería blandirla uno de los inmortales.

translation.en: So wait. You're saying I should be an Immortal One?
translation.es: ¿Dices que yo debería ser un inmortal?

translation.en: - What? No! - Ah, that's interesting.
They do whatever they want up there, right? That's me.
translation.es: Allá arriba hacen lo que quieren. Así soy yo.

translation.en: No rules. Me again.
- Best weapons? Uh- huh. Very much us. -
You're right. I don't belong here.
translation.es: Tienes razón. Este no es mi lugar.

translation.en: I belong with them!
Monkey King!
They'd never accept the likes of you.
translation.es: Nunca aceptarán a alguien como tú.

translation.en: I conquered a demon.
You'd have to defeat a hundred demons to even get their attention.
translation.es: Tendrías que derrotar a cien demonios para llamar su atención.

translation.en: - Oh yeah. -
- I suppose you're right. - Of course I'm right.
translation.es: Sí. Creo que tienes razón. Claro que sí.

translation.en: One hundred demons coming up!
Who's the handsome hero We all love and adore?
translation.es: ¿Quién es el héroe apuesto que todos amamos?

translation.en: Monkey King!
Who has demons screaming When he knocks on their door?
translation.es: ¿Quién hace a los demonios gritar si los va a buscar?

translation.en: Monkey King!
Who's a mighty fighter Who is brave and spunky
translation.es: ¿Quién es ese guerrero valiente y arrojado?

translation.en: And also a bit of a hunk?
He's the Monkey King!
Who's the ape you can't escape When he hunts you down?
translation.es: ¿Quién es el simio del que no puedes escapar?

translation.en: Monkey King!
Who's the chimp All the simple people will crown?
translation.es: ¿Quién es el chimpancé al que los plebeyos coronarán?

translation.en: Monkey King!
Who's the simian you'll find shimmying Up to the top
translation.es: ¿Quién es el simio que vibra hasta lo máximo?

translation.en: And you know he won't stop Till he's won?
translation.es: ¿Y que sabes que no parará hasta ganar?

translation.en: That's right, it's the Monkey King!
Ninety- nine demons down. One to go.
translation.es: Ya derroté 99 demonios. Me queda uno.

translation.en: Hey, hero here.
Once- in- a- lifetime hero meetup.
- Where is everyone? -
Anyone need a hero?
- Go away! - Leave us alone!
translation.es: - Vete. - Te oirá. - No molestes. - Nos va a matar.

translation.en: You'll get us killed!
translation.es: - No molestes. - Nos va a matar.

translation.en: Name's Monkey King.
AKA the Simian Savior. AKA the Legendary Demon Slayer.
translation.es: Alias el Simio Salvador o Legendario Caza Demonios.

translation.en: And Stick.
Our amazing skills include pole- fighting, punching,
translation.es: Somos expertos en lucha con palo, con puño,

translation.en: kicking, a kick- pole punch combo, the double- kick with or without Stick,
translation.es: patadas, combinaciones de golpes y patada doble con o sin Vara,

translation.en: or the ever- popular fake kick with a spinning pole.
translation.es: o el popular amague de patada con giro de palo.

translation.en: Monkey King?
I've never heard of you. - Well, I've never heard of you either. -
translation.es: - Nunca oí de ti. - Yo tampoco de ustedes.

translation.en: This village needs one of the Immortal Ones.
translation.es: Esta aldea necesita a un inmortal.

translation.en: - Not a monkey with a fancy stick. -
translation.es: No a un mono con un palo.

translation.en: This dump counts as a village? Come on!
- He's just gonna make it worse. - Get rid of him.
translation.es: Empeorará las cosas. - Deshazte de él. - Gracias por venir.

translation.en: Well, thanks for stopping by.
translation.es: - Deshazte de él. - Gracias por venir.

translation.en: I don't think you're getting how great I am--
He's the real deal, folks. A living legend.
translation.es: Él es lo máximo. Es una leyenda viviente.

translation.en: I am? I mean, of course I am.
If you've got a demon situation, this is your guy.
Where did you even come from, kid?
I've never seen her before, and I'm the mayor's wife.
translation.es: Nunca la había visto. Soy la esposa del alcalde, conozco a todos.

translation.en: I know everyone!
translation.es: Soy la esposa del alcalde, conozco a todos.

translation.en: You'd better get to know us. Unless you wanna be demon dumplings.
translation.es: Más vale que nos conozca, o será alimento de demonio.

translation.en: Okay. Whisper time.
Maybe the demon will eat the monkey.
translation.es: Tal vez el demonio se coma al mono.

translation.en: And leave us alone.
Either way, we win.
Oh, I like it. Break!
Brave warrior.
My poor, dear child was just kidnapped.
translation.es: Acaban de secuestrar a mi niño.

translation.en: - Fire beast? That'll be a hundred demons. -
translation.es: ¿Bestia de fuego? Llegaré a los cien demonios.

translation.en: - I'm in. Okay, desperate peasants. - Where's he going?
- Let's talk about my ascension ceremony. - Ascension ceremony?
translation.es: - Hablemos de mi ceremonia de ascensión. - ¿Qué?

translation.en: - Your what? - My big victory party.
How else will the Immortal Ones know it's time to come get me?
- Okay, I'll need a 35- piece orchestra. - No!
translation.es: - Quiero una orquesta de 35 músicos. - No.

translation.en: - A 100- person dragon dance. - No dancing.
And a huge fireworks extravaganza.
translation.es: Y un show de fuegos artificiales.

translation.en: My fireworks? Too expensive.
Unfortunately, ours is but a poor rice- farming village.
translation.es: Somos una aldea muy pobre que cultiva arroz.

translation.en: - Yeah, poor. -
How insulting. Come on, King. We're walking.
- Stop them! - Uh, uh…
Please, won't you and your assistant reconsider?
Assistant? I don't know this person. Who are you?
Only your number one fan.
I mean, this guy took down the white bone demon,
translation.es: Derrotó al demonio de hueso blanco,

translation.en: the red bone demon, and the bone demon of no specific color.
translation.es: al de hueso rojo y al de hueso sin color.

translation.en: We could sing songs about you, and I'll give you a grand speech.
translation.es: Te dedicaríamos canciones, yo daré el discurso.

translation.en: - And? - Uh, name a street after you?
- And? - And?
Oh, oh, oh, oh, a big, fat shiny medal of solid brass.

translation.en: Ooh, that will impress 'em. Okay. Next up. What's in it for my trusty companion?
translation.es: Eso los impresionará. ¿Qué hay para mi fiel compañera?

translation.en: - The girl? - No! My wondrous stick.
- What's in it for him? - Um, what does it want?
What do you want? A guitar.
But your stick can't play the guitar.
translation.es: Tu vara no sabe tocar la guitarra.

translation.en: And ten free guitar lessons.
Um, done?
- Done. - Hey, hey, hey, hey.
- Done. -
- Uh- oh. - The fire beast is outside.
translation.es: La bestia de fuego está afuera.

translation.en: Please don't let it hurt my innocent little child!
translation.es: Que no lastime a mi niño inocente.

translation.en: Don't worry.
The quicker I slay this fire demon, the faster we get to celebrate me.
translation.es: Cuanto antes derrote al demonio, antes me homenajearán.

translation.en: Please let me go!
Silence or I shall devour you!
Hey. I see you, demon.
- What are you doing? - Joining the Immortal Ones, duh.
translation.es: - ¿Qué haces? - Me uno a los inmortales.

translation.en: What?
Daddy! The demon was so mean!
There, there.
Wait. He's the kid?
What took you so long?
We had to find a hero.
- You're the worst daddy ever. - Now, son, don't hit Daddy.
translation.es: - Eres el peor papá. - No golpees a papi.

translation.en: Where's my snack? Hey! Ow!
Oh dear.
- What? - That was for free.
How dare you challenge Red Girl, Monkey King?
translation.es: ¿Cómo te atreves a desafiar a Niña Roja, Rey Mono?

translation.en: What's a Red Girl?
I am Red Girl!
Quake in my presence and bow to my awesome power!
translation.es: ¡Tiemblen en mi presencia y ríndanse a mi gran poder!

translation.en: Hey, Red Girl, leave these poor, unattractive people alone.
translation.es: Deja en paz a esta pobre gente.

translation.en: But the kids are ripest this time of year.
translation.es: Pero los niños están maduros en esta época del año.

translation.en: - Yum, yum, yum, yum, yum. - Daddy!
So yummy!
Okay, Monkey King, what's the play? Are you gonna--
Okay, little girl. I can take it from here.
Get her, Monkey King!
- - Hey, cut that out!
Behave!
Hey, you're a little scrawny for number 100, but we'll make it work.
translation.es: Eres escuálida para ser la número cien, pero da igual.

translation.en: Bad monkey!
- Like I care! -
Don't give up now. Ha! You're doing great.
translation.es: No te rindas. Vas muy bien.

translation.en: - - Hey, stop that! Ugh!
Congratulations! The Monkey King's last victim.
translation.es: Felicitaciones. La última víctima del Rey Mono.

translation.en: - You're gonna be famous. Ow! -
- Stick! -
- Goodbye, Monkey!  -
Yes!
Frustrated!
That Monkey's gonna burn down the whole village.
- Come on, everyone.  - Come on!
Agh! My fireworks shop!
- Over here. - Water coming up.
Toss it, kid.
- Eat fire, loser! - Back at ya.
Do you really think you can defeat me?
No. I know it.
And for the beef dish, sire,
translation.es: Y para el plato de carne,

translation.en: lettuce- wrapped or skewers?
Skewers it is.
- Daddy, I'm hungry! - Now, son--
It's the monkey!
Not my house!
Creepy.
Oh! Stick!
Burn, Monkey, burn!
Boom!
What a team!
Where did you get that stick?
It's fantastic!
Good idea, Stick. Hey, you want it?
Yeah, yeah, yeah! Gimme, gimme, gimme!
If you can hold it for ten seconds, it's yours.
translation.es: Si puedes aguantar diez segundos, es tuya.

translation.en: One, two…
- Four… Seven… - Four… Seven…
- Five. - Stop!
- Four… Eight… - One… Two…
Three…
You let go!
Yes!
One- hundredth demon vanquished!
- Monkey King reigns supreme! - And Stick.
translation.es: El Rey Mono es el rey supremo. Y Vara.

translation.en: Incredible. You got her to fall right into your trap.
translation.es: Increíble. La hiciste caer justo en la trampa.

translation.en: - I will learn so much from you. - You're still here?
Please. My name is Lin.
I am but a lowly peasant girl from a tiny village
translation.es: Soy una humilde campesina de una pequeña aldea,

translation.en: who hopes to make a difference someday.
I offer my skills as your humble assistant and weapon- bearer.
translation.es: Me ofrezco como asistente, cargaré tu arma.

translation.en: Wow. My own assistant?
Hard pass.
This monkey heroes alone.
translation.es: Este mono es héroe en solitario.

translation.en: So, you got my big victory speech ready, right?
Um, well, I--
Well, then, grab yourself a scroll and take notes because it's,
translation.es: Busquen un pergamino y tomen nota, porque empieza…

translation.en: ha, party time!
Crazy monkey!
Kaboom! Yeah!
How fortunate we poor ignorant villagers…
…are tonight to witness
the mighty Monkey King's heavenly ascension
translation.es: la ascensión celestial del poderoso Rey Mono

translation.en: to join the Immortal Ones.
translation.es: que se unirá a los inmortales.

translation.en: He saved our town.
- Sort of. -
He is the bravest, most spectac… spectac…
translation.es: Es el más valiente, más espectac…

translation.en: - Are you sure? - It's a word.
…spectacul- errific- amazing- derful hero
the world has ever known.
Wait for applause.
Whoo! Monkey King!
And now a song.
Music and lyrics by a handsome artist who, um, wishes to remain anonymous.
translation.es: Letra y música de un apuesto artista que prefiere mantenerse anónimo.

translation.en: Who's the handsome hero We all love and adore?
translation.es: ¿Quién es el héroe apuesto que todos amamos?

translation.en: Monkey King!
Who has demons screaming When he knocks on their door?
translation.es: ¿Quién hace a los demonios gritar si los va a buscar?

translation.en: Monkey King!
Who's the simian you'll find shimmying Up to the top

translation.en: And you know he won't stop Till he's won?

translation.en: That's right, it's the Monkey King!
Eh, you were a little flat. Ya!
Yeah! Monkey King!
Hm. It appears the ape didn't succumb to our fiery little minx as I'd hoped.
translation.es: Parece que el simio no sucumbió a nuestra niña descarada, como esperaba.

translation.en: Time to move.
Are you sufficiently moisturized, Your Grace?
You know what happens in the dry night air.
translation.es: Sabe cómo es el aire nocturno.

translation.en: Hm. Good point.
Onward!
Here's your medal.
Yes.
So, where are the Immortal Ones?
- Yeah, we were promised gods! - They're coming. Move.
One hundred demons defeated.
Wow. What an accomplishment.
The Immortal Ones can welcome me with open arms now.
translation.es: Los inmortales ya pueden recibirme con los brazos abiertos.

translation.en: I said now!
Now? Hello? This thing on?
They're here! See, peasants!
Behold as I ascend!
- You! - Ho ho!
You are no hero! You're a thief!
translation.es: No eres ningún héroe. ¡Eres un ladrón!

translation.en: Aw, you're not the Immortal Ones.
That is mine!
- What's wrong, Stick? You know this chump? -
Stick? You never talked to me.
Hey, hey, hey, hey. Who are you anyway?
I am the undersea ruler of the--
translation.es: Soy el rey de las profundidades del…

translation.en: - What? - Oh, look at his face.
- Low humidity. Arid climate. - Ew!
translation.es: Hay baja humedad y clima árido.

translation.en: Don't look at me! No, no, no. Be right back.
So invigorating.
- …undersea ruler of the dragon kingdom. - What? Come on.
And you, sir, stole my stick.
translation.es: Y usted, señor, robó mi vara.

translation.en: No, I didn't. I found it at the bottom of the ocean.
translation.es: No. La encontré en el fondo del mar.

translation.en: Right in the middle of some tacky palace.
Tacky? Once I reclaim my stick,
you and all these air- breathers will suffer my… my…
translation.es: tú y estos respiraaire van a sufrir mi…

translation.en: Again?
Arid climate. No. Look away!
…suffer my wrath!
There's supposed to be a lightning crash. And there it is.
translation.es: Debería haber un rayo. Ahí está.

translation.en: Hey, Babbo, how will we know when we're under the stick?
translation.es: ¿Cómo sabremos que estamos bajo la vara?

translation.en: Easy. The stick will be right above us.
How will we know we took the right stick?
translation.es: ¿Cómo sabremos que es la vara correcta?

translation.en: There's only one choice.
But what if we choose wrong, Babbo?
Look at that armor.
Who even wears brass with gold?
Look, buddy, I hear ya. You love my stick. Everyone loves the stick.
translation.es: Mira, amigo, te entiendo. Amas mi vara. Todos la aman.

translation.en: But no one appreciates the stick like I do.
translation.es: Pero nadie la aprecia como yo.

translation.en: - - Quiet! The grown- ups are talking.
translation.es: Silencio, Vara. Es cosa de grandes.

translation.en: And now you're ruining my exclusive ceremony.
Point is, Stick is not going anywhere.
translation.es: Vara no se irá a ninguna parte.

translation.en: - Ain't that right, Stick? Buddy? - Ow!
- Uh- oh. - Hey, are they with--
- - Stick, stay strong! I'm coming!
Oh no!
Hang on, Stick!
What?
Babbo, I'm gonna get sick!
Stick, left!
And to the right!
Ha ha! You missed!
Stick, darling, it's Dragon.
- He's mine! - Jump in the tub!
translation.es: - Es mía. - Salta a la tina.

translation.en: He only listens to me, flaky.
I don't see a ring on it, honey!
translation.es: No le veo un anillo, cariño.

translation.en: Itching! Flaking!
Of course! An avalanche.
- Hit the brake! - Fun ride, huh?
- - See ya!
- Babbo! - Curse you, gravity!
Ha ha! Monkey King reigns supreme!
translation.es: El Rey Mono es el rey supremo.

translation.en: Stick!
Catch me!
My palace is not tacky!
Gotcha!
Dragon King?
Fear not, little girl. The villain is gone.
translation.es: No temas, pequeña. El villano se fue.

translation.en: Maybe you're not as useless as I thought.
translation.es: Tal vez no seas tan inútil como creía.

translation.en: - So, do I have the job? - Um…
Nope.
Oh, come on.
Twenty minutes, and still no invite from the Jade Emperor.
translation.es: Aún ninguna invitación del Emperador de Jade.

translation.en: - What am I missing? -
Immortality! Of course. It's right in the name.
translation.es: ¿Inmortalidad? Claro. El nombre mismo lo dice.

translation.en: To become an Immortal One, I need immortality!
Maybe I can help.
Okay, look, kid. You see this?
Your palm?
No! I mean, yes. But no. This here is me.
translation.es: No. Digo, sí. Pero, no. Este soy yo.

translation.en: Okay?
And this tiny thing is you.
- Get it now? - Huh?
I'm the universe hand,
and you're an insignificant, useless pebble.
translation.es: y tú eres una mínima piedrita.

translation.en: Even a tiny pebble can make a big ripple, you know.
translation.es: Hasta una piedrita puede provocar una onda.

translation.en: That's just what a tiny pebble would say.
translation.es: Es lo que diría una piedrita.

translation.en: So, Stick, immortality, where do we go?
Really? Huh.
- But how do we get there? -
A graveyard? Spooky.
Grave… Gra…
- Graveyard. - You can't read.
Of course I can.
That's grass. That's the sky. That's a rock. See? Reading.
translation.es: Eso es pasto. Ese es el cielo. Esa es una roca. ¿Ves? Leo.

translation.en: - Graveyard's that way. - Obviously.
- - No, no, no, no, no. We don't need her.
- He wants me to come. Doesn't he? - Just go home, kid.
translation.es: - Quiere que vaya. - Vete a casa.

translation.en: I can't go home. There's trouble back there,
translation.es: No puedo. Hay problemas en casa,

translation.en: and it made me do some things.
translation.es: y tuve que hacer cosas que no debí haber hecho.

translation.en: - Things I probably shouldn't have done. - Ooh! You killed someone?
translation.es: y tuve que hacer cosas que no debí haber hecho. - ¿Matar a alguien? - No.

translation.en: I just wanna do big things someday. Like you.
translation.es: Algún día quiero hacer grandes cosas. Como tú.

translation.en: - I know. No. I-- - - Yes, but-- -
translation.es: Ya sé. No. Bueno, sí, pero…

translation.en: How much reading could we possibly need?
- - Fine. I said fine!
So, assistant girl, you coming or what?
So, where to next?
In there? Us? How?
This. It's like an all- access VIP pass. Any realm, any dimension. Even the Land of the Dead.
translation.es: Esto da acceso vip a cualquier dimensión. Hasta el reino de los muertos.

translation.en: But you're not dead.
And if all goes well, never will be.
translation.es: Y si todo sale bien, jamás lo estaré.

translation.en: Okay. If we're gonna fit in, we gotta dress the part.
What the heck?
Not heck.
Hell.
Try to keep up.
Are we even supposed to be here?
Absolutely not. Isn't it great?
See, the day you're supposed to die
translation.es: El día que vas a morir

translation.en: is recorded in the Scroll of Life and Death.
translation.es: está en el pergamino de la vida y la muerte.

translation.en: But if my name should somehow get crossed out,
then no death registered, and guess who's immortal?
translation.es: se borra la muerte, ¿y quién será inmortal?

translation.en: Me!
One more thing. Die in hell, stay in hell. So don't die.
translation.es: Algo más. Si mueres en el infierno, aquí te quedas. No mueras.

translation.en: This is a bad idea.
Next.
Act like a ghost.
Oh yeah. Great. You're giving me chills.
King here! Coming through!
translation.es: Soy el rey. A un lado.

translation.en: Make way.
Next! Release form.
You brought a live chicken to the underworld?
No living things allowed!
We really should go now.
Watch and learn, Pebble.
Oh no.
That's better. Pit of Infinite Agony. Fourth floor on your right. Next!
translation.es: Mejor. Al pozo de la agonía infinita. Cuarto piso a la derecha. ¡El que sigue!

translation.en: Yes, good morning.
I'd like a quick glance at the Life and Death Scrolls.
Release form first.
It's in my other armor?
translation.es: Lo dejé en la otra armadura.

translation.en: Rejected!
- Release form. - Back to the world of the living.
translation.es: - Formulario. - Nos vamos con los vivos.

translation.en: Not so fast.
- As my assistant, your first duty… -
…is to be the sacrificial lamb.
- What are you doing? - She's alive? Here in hell?
- What? - You're alive!
How scandalous!
And you cut in front of all these people?
- What? - No living things allowed!
- Oh, Monkey! - Uh, uh, I… I'm not…
I couldn't be more dead. Fresh corpse here.
translation.es: Estoy bien muerta. Soy un cadáver.

translation.en: How did you die?
Old age. No, I mean scurvy. Earthquake?
translation.es: De anciana. No, de escorbuto. ¿Un terremoto?

translation.en: A duel. Two duels.
Here's the story.
I fell… off a cliff into a hole filled with sharks.
translation.es: Caí de un acantilado en un hoyo lleno de tiburones.

translation.en: Rabid sharks.
And then a house fell on me,
and I drowned. Yeah.
Okay, you're in.
Chamber of Ridiculous Deaths.
Fifth floor down the hall.
Next!
- - What a guy.
- Hey! -
Monkey! You abandoned me in the middle of hell.
translation.es: ¡Mono! Me abandonaste en la mitad del infierno.

translation.en: You don't leave a teammate behind.
What teammate? You're an assistant. An insignificant pebble.
- Stop calling me that. - Absolutely.
As soon as you find my scroll so I can cross my name off. Come on.
translation.es: Apenas encuentre mi pergamino para tachar mi nombre. Vamos.

translation.en: - This shouldn't take long. -
What?
Get reading.
What's your family name? Don't have one. I was born from a rock.
translation.es: - ¿Cuál es tu apellido? - No tengo. Nací de una roca.

translation.en: A rock?
More of a rock egg. The scrolls list your family history.
translation.es: Una roca-huevo. Los pergaminos dicen tu historia familiar.

translation.en: I must have parents, right?
Well, I guess.
Everyone does.
Ha! Looking for your scrolls?
My scroll? Why does he have my scroll?
You don't belong here, outsiders.
Oh ho! Time to defeat demon 101.
Mighty brush! Stamp of doom!
Open! Hyah!
- Don't let them get away! - Capture them!
Stop the monkey!
Through 115.
- Clones, eh? -
I can? Really? Cool!
Monkey King reigns supreme!
translation.es: El Rey Mono es el rey supremo.

translation.en: Bring it!
Not the beard!
Next!
- Wait! Time- out. I'm not a part of this. - Nobody's on the bench!
translation.es: - Tiempo. Yo no juego. - Nadie va al banco.

translation.en: - Get her! - Duck!
Got 'em.
Monkey, I got 'em. This one's mine. Huh?
translation.es: Mono, los tengo. Este es mío.

translation.en: Hey! Not yours!
What's it say about my family?
It says
you don't have one.
Oh. I'm all alone?
I'm sorry, Monkey. - Which means-- -
Oof! I'm an original!
One of a kind!
- Give me that scroll. - Third line from the bottom.
Step away from the scroll, you flea- bitten, mortal lowlife! Close!
translation.es: Aléjate del pergamino, basura mortal y pulgosa.

translation.en: Come on!
Got it.
Yeah, baby!
Monkey King!
Oh, her.
Ow! That hurt.
And now I'm immortal!
Even for hell, this is bad.
What's up, Yama? Or should I say, what's down?
I beseech you. A rogue primate has invaded hell and-- Ow!
translation.es: Se lo suplico. Un primate granuja invadió el infierno…

translation.en: Hey, uh, Jade Emperor, right? Listen, great news.
Get the Immortal Ones together. I'm on my way. We're gonna be neighbors.
translation.es: Reúna a los inmortales. Voy para allá. Seremos vecinos.

translation.en: So you're the Monkey King. Gonna party at your banquets.
translation.es: - Así que tú eres el Rey Mono. - Iré a sus festines.

translation.en: - Get hammered. - Release form!
- We're gonna share battle stories. - Please. You're not one of us.
translation.es: - Compartiremos anécdotas. - No eres uno de nosotros.

translation.en: Actually, I am. Crossed my name out and everything.
translation.es: De hecho, sí. Taché mi nombre y todo.

translation.en: That only makes you half- immortal.
- Half? - You can't die of old age.
Oh, that's great!
But you can still die in battle.
Don't look at me. This was your plan.
translation.es: No me mires. Fue tu plan.

translation.en: Well, this is new information.
So, how exactly does one get full immortality?
You don't. Not possible.
Well, there is The Book of Everlasting Life, my lord.
translation.es: Está el libro de la vida eterna, señor.

translation.en: - You shut your beard hole right now! - My bad.
- Stick, door! -
Assistant, book! Monkey, stay handsome.
translation.es: Asistente, el libro. Mono, sigue así de apuesto.

translation.en: Whatever you do, don't let him leave with that book!
translation.es: Hagas lo que hagas, ¡que no se vaya con el libro!

translation.en: Let's go.
- - Make way!
Catch him! Catch him!
No, no, no, no, no, no, no! Monkey!
Ha! Well, that was fun. You got the book?
- Uh, um, uh… - You didn't lose it, did you?
You had one job!
One job and you blew it!
- Just messing with you! - Do you treat all your friends like this?
translation.es: - Era un chiste. - ¿Así tratas a tus amigos?

translation.en: Friends? Whoa, okay. You're more like a teammate on my very critical mission.
translation.es: ¿Amigos? Más bien eres una compañera en una misión muy importante.

translation.en: Well, that's better than a pebble.
All right. Moving on. See this?
This book can tell us how I can get my full immortality.
translation.es: Este libro me dirá cómo obtener inmortalidad plena.

translation.en: Okay. Uh, it says…
Oh. Full immortality can be attained by eating a magical peach
translation.es: Obtienes inmortalidad si comes un durazno mágico

translation.en: from the Enchanted Orchard of Everlasting Life.
Ooh! Where's that?
This could take a while.
And I will give you five minutes.
This monkey's insane.
Oh really?
He gets in fights, insults the gods.
He just stole a book from hell! Oh yeah, did I mention? We went to hell!
translation.es: Robó un libro del infierno. ¿No sabía? ¡Fuimos al infierno!

translation.en: Okay, let's bring the sass down to, like, a four, okay, sweetheart?
translation.es: Bajemos un poco el tono, cariño.

translation.en: I can't keep this up. I can't do this. Listen, honey, we made a deal.
translation.es: - No puedo seguir. No puedo hacerlo. - Cariño, hicimos un trato.

translation.en: There's no backing out now.
Or did you forget?
I remember.
I beseech you, divine dragon.
End our suffering.
Our crops are dying.
Could you please grace us with a rainstorm?
- We've been searching forever! - What?
Why aren't the wanted posters working?
But we put them up everywhere, Your Grace. There's one.
translation.es: Los pusimos en todas partes. Ahí hay uno.

translation.en: What is this?
I told you to draw the monkey, you dimwit!
translation.es: Te dije que dibujaras un mono, tonto.

translation.en: But, sire, monkeys are so much harder to draw than sticks.
translation.es: Pero, cuesta más dibujar un mono que una vara.

translation.en: - No, wait, wait! - What the--
Divine Master of Weather. Thank you for answering my call.
translation.es: Maestro del clima. Respondió a mi súplica.

translation.en: How dare you, a mere mortal, speak to his lordship.
translation.es: ¿Eres mortal y te atreves a hablarle a su alteza?

translation.en: - Avert your eyes. - My apologies.
We have no food here. No water.
Could you please, please send us rain?
Well, aren't you a presumptuous little snack.
Wait, please!
I'll do anything. You must need something. An assistant. A servant.
translation.es: Haré lo que sea. ¿Necesita una asistente? ¿Una criada?

translation.en: A human servant? Ha!
He already has two perfectly good and trusted advisors.
We carry his tub.
No! No. But perhaps our monkey would.
translation.es: No, pero tal vez el mono sí.

translation.en: Monkey?
Would you lie for me? Get your paws dirty?
You'll have to be manipulative, vicious, and cunning.
translation.es: Debes ser manipuladora, despiadada y astuta.

translation.en: Do you have that in you, you scrumptious, sweet little thing?
Because when you make a deal with me, you follow through or…
translation.es: Si haces un trato conmigo, debes cumplirlo o…

translation.en: It's chapped lips for you!
Benbo, he eats her.
Oh! Yeah, that too.
Okay. I accept.
Befriend a certain monkey, earn his trust, and take his stick.
translation.es: Hazte amiga de cierto mono, gánate su confianza y quítale la vara.

translation.en: When it's in my possession,
translation.es: Cuando la tenga en mi poder,

translation.en: you'll get your rain.
He never lets the stick out of his sight.
translation.es: Nunca pierde de vista la vara.

translation.en: The sooner it's in my grip,
the faster you'll get your drip, drip, drip.
Well, now he's got me searching this stolen book for some Orchard of Everlasting Life.
translation.es: Me hace buscar en un libro robado el Huerto de la Inmortalidad.

translation.en: He's still trying to join the Immortal Ones?
translation.es: ¿Aún trata de unirse a los inmortales?

translation.en: What a fool.
What should I do?
Hm. He wants an enchanted peach now, does he?
Oh, well, I'll just have to put on a little show and give him one.
translation.es: Bueno, tendremos que montar un show y darle uno.

translation.en: All you need to worry about is getting him there.
You sure this is the right way to get to that fancy peach orchard?
translation.es: ¿Segura de que este es el camino al huerto?

translation.en: Yeah, definitely.
- Woo- hoo! - Do you have to go top speed?
This? Ha! Please.
- I'll show you top speed. - No, no, no. I--
translation.es: - Esto es a toda velocidad. - No…

translation.en: Hey!
Now, any personal assistant of mine really needs to be in the moment.
translation.es: Mi asistente personal debe estar en todo.

translation.en: Yeah, yeah.
You need to be more focused and pay better attention.
translation.es: Debes concentrarte y prestar más atención.

translation.en: I need to know you'll always have my back.
translation.es: Debo saber que siempre me apoyarás.

translation.en: Monkey!
He's coming back. He's coming back.
And my shoes perfectly shined.
translation.es: Y quiero mis zapatos bien lustrados.

translation.en: He's not coming back!
It's the attention to detail that I value most.
translation.es: Lo que más valoro es la atención a los detalles.

translation.en: Where to next? The hills? The desert?
Aw, man!
Trees.
So many trees.
I could've died peacefully in my village, but, no!
translation.es: Pude haber muerto en paz en mi aldea, pero no.

translation.en: Chamber of Ridiculous Deaths, here I come.
translation.es: Cámara de muertes ridículas, allá voy.

translation.en: Who's the handsome hero We love and adore?
translation.es: ¿Quién es el héroe apuesto que todos amamos?

translation.en: Monkey King!
Man, that's really catchy.
Help!
- Where is she? -
Oh, there you are. Did you hear any of my performance evaluation?
translation.es: Ahí estás. ¿Oíste mi evaluación de desempeño?

translation.en: - - You are crazy!
And handsome.
If you're gonna be critical, be fair.
translation.es: Si vas a ser crítica, sé justa.

translation.en: Places, everyone. Places!
Almost showtime.
Buzz for me, Babbo. Buzz!
Must I, sire?
Come on. Sell it.
Look at my little stinger!
- I'm adorable! - All right, Benbo, less is more.
He's never gonna buy this. Does this look like an enchanted peach garden?
translation.es: No se lo creerá. ¿Esto parece un huerto de duraznos encantado?

translation.en: If you believe it, so will your audience. Here are the new sides.
translation.es: Si tú lo crees, tu público también. Este es el guion.

translation.en: Try not to step on each other's lines. Keep the scene contained.
translation.es: No se pisen. Que la escena fluya.

translation.en: I only had time to poison one tree.
The toxin should take only a few moments to knock him out cold.
translation.es: La toxina tardará unos instantes en dejarlo frito.

translation.en: Remember, the tree in the light has the peach he should bite.
translation.es: El árbol iluminado tiene el durazno indicado.

translation.en: If it's hidden by night, then the fruit isn't right. Got it?
translation.es: Si la noche lo oscurece, la fruta perece. ¿Entendido?

translation.en: Okay. If the tree is in light, then, um, uh…
- It's the peach he should bite. - Oh yeah. So definitely not that tree.
translation.es: - …tiene el durazno indicado. - No es ese árbol.

translation.en: Yes, exactly that tree.
But that tree's not white. It's more of a brown.
translation.es: Pero no es blanco. Es marrón.

translation.en: No, not the color!
I lit it up for you. See?
Still nothing?
So, it's a glowing tree?
Exactly. Wow.
And once the monkey passes out, I'll grab the stick and--
translation.es: Y cuando el mono se desmaye, tomaré la vara y…

translation.en: Oh, here they come.
Everybody back to one. Hit your marks. And let's have some fun out there.
translation.es: Todos a sus lugares. A sus marcas. Vamos a divertirnos.

translation.en: Whoopsie- daisy!
This one? No. That one.
Ugh. This peach grove looks kinda shabby. Are you sure this is--
translation.es: Este huerto está un poco descuidado. ¿Será…?

translation.en: Oh yeah. One bite of the magical fruit, and you get full immortality.
translation.es: Sí. Una mordida a ese fruto mágico y serás inmortal.

translation.en: Behold this magic garden
Full of magic nature
It's the Orchard of Everlasting Life
translation.es: Es el Huerto de la Inmortalidad.

translation.en: We are the magic guardians
And the pollinators Of this magic orchard
translation.es: y polinizadores de este huerto mágico,

translation.en: Which is definitely real
I don't know why, but I like these guys.
translation.es: No sé por qué, pero me agradan.

translation.en: Oh yeah, totally.
Ha, ha, ha, ha, ha! Handsome, hairy stranger
We are the protectors
Of the nectar of immortality
We promise there's no danger
So eat a poison peach
I mean, the peaches that are juiciest Are in that glowing tree
translation.es: Digo, el durazno más jugoso es el del árbol brilloso.

translation.en: Hopefully
Stand back.
I'm not feeling anything special.
Hey, do I look immortal?
- Hm, well-- - Or maybe it's the tree over here.
translation.es: - Bueno… - Tal vez sea este árbol.

translation.en: That's ridiculous. The one in the light has the juiciest--
translation.es: Qué ridiculez. El árbol iluminado tiene…

translation.en: Stick to the pages!
Maybe it's this tree. The one in the dark. That's the most delicious.
translation.es: Tal vez sea este árbol. El oscuro. Es el más delicioso.

translation.en: Hold it. Let me check.
Nope. Definitely not as juicy as the one--
translation.es: No. No es tan jugoso como…

translation.en: The tree in the dark…
Uh, what's wrong with this one?
…has the tastiest bark.
That seems suspicious.
No, no, no, no. This is definitely the right tree.
translation.es: No. Este es el árbol correcto.

translation.en: - Eat it. - No, you eat it.
- No, you eat it. - No improv.
- You eat it first. - You eat it.
- You eat it. - Come on. Just eat it. Yum.
How about at the same time?
Fine. Immortality, here I come.
I don't feel anything. What?
Oh, wait. Maybe I do.
I feel good!
Me too!
Maybe you should just sit down.
Hey! Buzz off, lady, and mind your own…
translation.es: Oye. Vete zumbando, señorita, no te metas…

translation.en: Beeswax?
No! Beeswax.
Clear the stage. I'll take that stick. Thank you very much.
translation.es: Despejen el escenario. Tomaré la vara. Muchas gracias.

translation.en: - Hey, I know you. -
Oh, your skin's all cleared up. You are gorgy!
translation.es: Te mejoró la piel. Estás bellísimo.

translation.en: You must be from the Dang Dynasty!
translation.es: Debes ser de la dinastía Dang.

translation.en: Hey, hey, you gotta try these peaches, man.
You idiot!
Don't you realize what's in those
yummy, mouth- watering…
Who wants to take a bath with me?
I do!
Yay!
We're hot- tubbing with the dragon!
Everyone's gonna get crazy!
Oh man!
I loved those guys!
Those… Those are good people.
But the two of you are my best friends.
translation.es: Pero ustedes dos son mis mejores amigos.

translation.en: No. No, no, no, no. We're not friends.
The three of us, we're family.
What just… What just happened?
Dra… Uh, Dragon?
Monkey?
You awake?
- Agh! - Wait!
Did the peaches work? Am I fully immortal now?
- Knock my head off. - What?
Take my stick and whack me in the face. It's all right. Come on, come on. Do it.
translation.es: Golpéame con la vara en la cara. Vamos. Hazlo.

translation.en: I won't even feel it.
- Fine. I'll do it myself, wuss. -
translation.es: Está bien. Lo haré yo, cobarde.

translation.en: - Those peaches were defective. - Maybe they're out of season.
translation.es: Esos duraznos estaban malos. - Tal vez no sea la temporada. - Nuestra búsqueda fracasó, Vara.

translation.en: - What? Our quest has failed, Stick. -
translation.es: - Tal vez no sea la temporada. - Nuestra búsqueda fracasó, Vara.

translation.en: - - You're still half- immortal.
I don't do half- things. Yeah, I noticed.
translation.es: - No hago las cosas a medias. - Sí, me di cuenta.

translation.en: This old geezer once told me all the things I couldn't do.
translation.es: El anciano una vez me dijo todo lo que no podía hacer.

translation.en: That I'd wind up alone.
Yeah. You'll never amount to anything.
I heard that all the time back home.
Wow.
Wish I could relate.
Well, thanks for your help.
- I mean, it was mostly me. - You're leaving?
- It was nice knowing you, little girl. - But no!
Don't go. You said we were family.
- No, I didn't. - You did. Doesn't sound like me.
translation.es: - Claro que no. Yo no hablo así. - Sí.

translation.en: - Well, you said it. - That was just the peaches talking.
translation.es: - Lo dijiste. - Fue por el durazno.

translation.en: But you promised we'd do big things. We can't give up now.
translation.es: Prometiste que haríamos grandes cosas. Debemos seguir.

translation.en: We? Who's this we?
I'm still gonna join the Immortal Ones. - Just not with you. -
translation.es: Aún me uniré a los inmortales, pero no contigo.

translation.en: You know what? I'm starting to think that wasn't even the real peach orchard.
translation.es: Empiezo a creer que ese no era el verdadero huerto.

translation.en: What?
You think I… I deliberately brought you to the wrong place?
translation.es: ¿Crees que te traje al lugar equivocado?

translation.en: L- L- Like some sort of… Like some sort of trap?
You're saying I lied to you?
I'm not not saying it.
You know what? Go ahead. Walk away. You're so selfish.
You only care about yourself.
- Well, no one else will. - Ugh! 'Cause you won't let them.
translation.es: - Nadie más lo hará. - Porque no lo permites.

translation.en: Someday, you really will end up all alone.
- What are you yapping on about? -
Who's that? Assistant, what does it say?
An authority on everlasting life, the royal sorceress, Wangmu,
translation.es: Autoridad de la vida eterna, Wangmu, la hechicera real,

translation.en: can often be found in her laboratory brewing her famous Elixir of Immortality.
